verbs.description: [ARG0: The US] [V: had] [ARG1: a trade surplus with six of its top 15 trade partners] [ARGM-TMP: in 2017] , [ARGM-ADV: despite President Trump 's insistence the US has deficit with " almost all countries] . "
The US had a trade surplus with six of its top 15 trade partners in 2017 , despite President Trump 's insistence [ARG0: the US] [V: has] [ARG1: deficit with " almost all countries] . "
